dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 21, 2005 9:41 PM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
Received:         from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by
mail with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50) id
1DOLNm-0004sA-Bb for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Wed, 20 Apr 2005 15:01:10 -0500
Received:         from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1DOLNh-000OSd-Pr for
abuseadm@theplanet.com; Wed, 20 Apr 2005 15:01:09 -0500
Received:         (qmail 20289 invoked from network); 20 Apr 2005 20:01:05
-0000
Received:         from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110) by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 20 Apr 2005 20:01:05 -0000
Received:         from [172.16.214.181] (helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by
mail with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim 4.50) id
1DOLNf-0004rW-4h for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 20 Apr 2005 15:01:03 -0500
Received:         from mail.ic.sunysb.edu ([129.49.1.4]) by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from info@freemsnemotions.com) with
esmtp (Exim) id 1DOLNV-000OPm-Ex for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 20 Apr
2005 15:01:02 -0500
Received:         from postal.ic.sunysb.edu (mail [129.49.1.4]) by
mail.ic.sunysb.edu (8.13.1/8.13.1) with SMTP id j3KK0aIL005038; Wed, 20 Apr
2005 16:00:47 -0400 (EDT)
Received:         from smtp.ic.sunysb.edu ([129.49.1.24]) by
postal.ic.sunysb.edu (SMSSMTP 4.1.0.19) with SMTP id
M2005042016004724213 ; Wed, 20 Apr 2005 16:00:47 -0400
Received:         from h2izzo (ca210-062.resnet.stonybrook.edu
[130.245.210.62]) by smtp.ic.sunysb.edu (8.13.1/8.13.1) with SMTP id
j3KK0grM005058; Wed, 20 Apr 2005 16:00:46 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID:         <09b901c545e3$a3a4dab0$3ed2f582@h2izzo>
From:         Izzet Zorlu <info@freemsnemotions.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date:         Wed, 20 Apr 2005 16:00:37 -0400
MIME-Version:         1.0
Content-Type:         multipart/mixed;
boundary="----=_NextPart_000_09B5_01C545C2.1786F660"
X-Priority:         3
X-MSMail-Priority:         Normal
X-Mailer:         Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2527
X-MimeOLE:         Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2527
Received-SPF:         none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 129.49.1.4 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of freemsnemotions.com) client-ip=129.49.1.4;
envelope-from=info@freemsnemotions.com;
helo=mail.ic.sunysb.edu;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -99.8
Cc:         info@freemsnemotions.com
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.5
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -99.8



1. I, Izzet Zorlu, is the owner and I am authorized to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. My electronic
signature is attached to this email as signature.jpg.

2. Multiple copyrighted works at a single online site have been infringed.
These include the website design, all text written on the website and all
the images (including the small *.gif files that are refered to as "MSN
emoticons". Site URL is www.freemsnemotions.com
<http://www.freemsnemotions.com>

3. The whole website, www.msnall.com <http://www.msnall.com> is infringing,
including website design, all text and all images.

4. My telephone is 631.216.2790 and email is info@freemsnemotions.com
<mailto:info@freemsnemotions.com>

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, it's agent, or the
law.

6. I assure that the information in this notification is accurate.

I am also attaching an image file, LP4008_billgates_proof.gif, that proves
that the image located at http://www.msnall.com/images/famous-bill-gates.gif
is infringing the same copyrighted image on my website
http://www.freemsnemotions.com/celebrities/famous-bill-gates.gif

Please inform me about your further actions.

Thanks,
Izzet Zorlu
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCaGQ0vK/XpJs6oyURAliHAJ9fQXKurlwAF9lo89SY3XQ7OrgYvgCdEmdf
eMntVTg75GPuitfDM+ctNbI=
=m2X1
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
